dialog.text: Hello. The seeker  isWelcome. The supporter could offer some drink or food to the seeker.
Oh, hi, how are you doing?

I feel emotionally sad. The seeker  feels emotional and sad because he or she is scared of getting into trouble. The supporter could tell the seeker to try to think about the fear in question. The supporter could also tell the seeker to seek professional therapy.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope I could help you. Why are you feeling emotionally sad?

My boyfriend broke up with me about several months ago. And he didn't even say goodbye face to face. I just don't know why.. The seeker  feels emotionally sad because she knowledge that she is breaking up with her boyfriend. The supporter could say the seeker has time to think about it. The supporter could also say the supporter could keep the seeker in touch.
Oh, I'm so sorry! That is really hard when you feel betrayed like that. I think that you might be better off without him..
beam_texts: Oh, I'm so sorry! That is really hard when you feel betrayed like that. I think that you might be better off without him..

dialog.text: I think so too.. The seeker  feels emotionally sad because she fears that she will not be able to keep her job. The supporter could tell the seeker to pack and take care of things in order to not feel so propsed down.
I've been in a similar situation and I know how hard it is..
beam_texts: I've been in a similar situation and I know how hard it is..

dialog.text: I don't know what to do with myself.. The seeker  feels emotionally sad because she was cheated on and she doesn't know what to do about it. The supporter could tell her that she should talk to her partner about this. The supporter could also suggest her to seek therapy.
Have you tried to talk to your partner about how you feel? It helps to clear the air and make sure that everyone understands everyone elses perspective..
beam_texts: Have you tried to talk to your partner about how you feel? It helps to clear the air and make sure that everyone understands everyone elses perspective..

dialog.text: I have and he says he feels the same way. But I don't know what I did to make him do this.. The seeker  feels angry and betrayed because her partner broke up with her. The supporter could try to help the seeker understand what went wrong and how she can overcome this anger.

I think that you did nothing wrong. Sometimes people just feel different at a certain time and it can be hard for the other person to understand. I would suggest giving him some time to think about what he wants and how you feel.
beam_texts: I think that you did nothing wrong. Sometimes people just feel different at a certain time and it can be hard for the other person to understand. I would suggest giving him some time to think about what he wants and how you feel.

dialog.text: I think you're right. But I'm just not sure how long. We're not together anymore and I don't know how long to wait before I try to find someone else.. The seeker  is feeling emotionally sad because she is know that she is not with her boyfriend. The supporter could suggest the seeker to try dating and being in a relationship with another person.
I would give it at least a year before you try to find someone new.
beam_texts: I would give it at least a year before you try to find someone new.

dialog.text: Okay, I think that's a good idea. But it's hard not to get anxious and worried about what will happen next. The seeker  feels anxious and sad because she is not with her boyfriend. The supporter could help the seeker to set a time limit for finding someone new.
I understand it is hard to wait, but you should try to focus on things that you can control..
beam_texts: I understand it is hard to wait, but you should try to focus on things that you can control..

dialog.text: I think that's also a good idea. But what if I don't find anything in the meantime? I don't want to be stuck in a relationship just because I'm waiting for something. The seeker  is feeling anxious and worried about the possibility of being without her boyfriend. The supporter could help the seeker to take a steps back and think about what will happen next.
I think you should try to spend more time with your friends and family. They will help you to get over your ex.
beam_texts: I think you should try to spend more time with your friends and family. They will help you to get over your ex.

dialog.text: That's also a good idea. But what if my friends and family make fun of me for being in a relationship now?. The seeker  feels anxious and frustrated because she is not sure what will happen next. The supporter could provide her with some resources like support groups or psycho-social classes to help her focus on what she wants and not worry about the future.
I think that they would not do that if you told them what is going on.
beam_texts: I think that they would not do that if you told them what is going on.

dialog.text: That's also true. But what if they start to make fun of me for being in a relationship with an ex?. The seeker  is feeling anxious and scared because she thinks she will be made fun of for being in a relationship with a past partner. The supporter could tell the seeker to try and have a conversation with friends about why she is feeling anxiety and sad. The supporter could also say that it is important to have friends and family who can help help self-care.
I think that they are not worth your time if they are going to make fun of you for things that happened in the past.
beam_texts: I think that they are not worth your time if they are going to make fun of you for things that happened in the past.

dialog.text: That's also true. But what if my ex starts to make fun of me for things that happened in the past. The seeker  is scared of being alone because she has heard that her friends and family will make fun of her. The supporter could tell the seeker to spend more time with her friends and family to help her feel more connected.
I think that you should not let that happen. You should stand up for yourself and if they do not respect that, then maybe it is time to move on.
beam_texts: I think that you should not let that happen. You should stand up for yourself and if they do not respect that, then maybe it is time to move on.
